startIntroPart1: Hello, parasites! I am Dr.Leo, I went down from the airship there to prove how well you will develop a Storia.
declaringWar: What? I will destroy you, bastard!
defeated: No! Not that, you can't stop me!
introduction: Hello!  Have a nice day, citizen of Storia.
hateHello: Get out of here, friend!  You are a natural parasite!
tradeRequest: Please agree to my exchange. I will be very pleased!
uniqueText: If Doctor Leo stops his atrocities, then Storia Town will be saved - Super Zach

name: Bread-o-town
startIntroPart1: The Spirit of the Bread Barbershop is calling!
